models.hero: The main headline section that captures attention and communicates the core investment message.
models.keyPoints: The bullet points highlighting key aspects of the investment opportunity.
models.cta: The call-to-action that directs visitors to get in touch.

relationships: This is a single-page layout where hero, keyPoints, and cta work together as page content
The CTA links to the Contact & Engagement section

hero.headline: Invest in Ukraine's Future
hero.subheadline: Join us in building AI-powered cities that will transform governance, attract talent back home, and position Ukraine as a global leader in urban innovation.

keyPoints.title: Transparent AI Governance
keyPoints.description: Your investment supports the development of corruption-free, data-driven city management systems that set new standards for public governance worldwide.

keyPoints.title: Proven Expert Team
keyPoints.description: ГО "Розум" brings together leading specialists in AI, urban planning, energy, and healthcare with decades of combined experience in large-scale projects.

keyPoints.title: Regional Economic Impact
keyPoints.description: Each AI-powered city creates an ecosystem supporting hundreds of local SMEs, generating sustainable economic growth across Ukrainian regions.

keyPoints.title: Bringing Talent Home
keyPoints.description: Modern, high-tech cities offer the quality of life that attracts millions of talented Ukrainians back from abroad, rebuilding the nation's human capital.

keyPoints.title: Multiple Partnership Pathways
keyPoints.description: Whether as an investor, technology partner, or strategic collaborator, there are flexible options to participate in this transformative initiative.

cta.description: Get in touch with our team to discuss investment opportunities, partnership options, or to request detailed project documentation.
